SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.ALGOSUBMISSION_ID AS id, AP.ALGO_PROBLEM_TITLE AS title, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName, T.SUBMITTED_AT AS createdAt, 'algo' AS boardType FROM ALGO_SUBMISSIONS T JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = T.USER_ID JOIN ALGO_PROBLEMS AP ON AP.ALGO_PROBLEM_ID = T.ALGO_PROBLEM_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT C.CODEBOARD_ID AS id, C.CODEBOARD_TITLE AS title, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName, C.CODEBOARD_CREATED_AT AS createdAt, 'code' AS boardType FROM CODEBOARD C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = C.USER_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT F.FREEBOARD_ID AS id, F.FREEBOARD_TITLE AS title, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName, F.FREEBOARD_CREATED_AT AS createdAt, 'free' AS boardType FROM FREEBOARD F JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = F.USER_ID ) AS combined
AND boardType = #{cond.boardType}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.keyword}, '%')
AND userNickName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY
${cond.sortField}
createdAt
ASC DESC
LIMIT #{cond.size} OFFSET #{cond.offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT T.ALGOSUBMISSION_ID AS id, AP.ALGO_PROBLEM_TITLE AS title, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName, T.SUBMITTED_AT AS createdAt, 'algo' AS boardType FROM ALGO_SUBMISSIONS T JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = T.USER_ID JOIN ALGO_PROBLEMS AP ON AP.ALGO_PROBLEM_ID = T.ALGO_PROBLEM_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT C.CODEBOARD_ID AS id, C.CODEBOARD_TITLE AS title, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName, C.CODEBOARD_CREATED_AT AS createdAt, 'code' AS boardType FROM CODEBOARD C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = C.USER_ID
UNION ALL
SELECT F.FREEBOARD_ID AS id, F.FREEBOARD_TITLE AS title, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName, F.FREEBOARD_CREATED_AT AS createdAt, 'free' AS boardType FROM FREEBOARD F JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_ID = F.USER_ID ) AS combined
AND boardType = #{cond.boardType}
AND title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.keyword}, '%')
AND userNickName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cond.keyword}, '%')

select t.ALGOSUBMISSION_ID ,t.USER_ID , u.USER_NICKNAME , ap.ALGO_PROBLEM_TITLE, ap.ALGO_PROBLEM_DESCRIPTION, ap.ALGO_PROBLEM_DIFFICULTY, ap.PROBLEM_TYPE, t.SOURCE_CODE, l.LANGUAGE_NAME, t.AI_FEEDBACK, t.AI_FEEDBACK_TYPE, t.SOLVE_MODE, t.SOLVING_DURATION_SECONDS, t.SUBMITTED_AT from ALGO_SUBMISSIONS t join ALGO_PROBLEMS ap on ap.ALGO_PROBLEM_ID = t.ALGO_PROBLEM_ID join LANGUAGES l on l.LANGUAGE_ID = t.LANGUAGE_ID join USERS u on u.USER_ID = t.USER_ID where t.ALGOSUBMISSION_ID = #{boardId}

SELECT c.CODEBOARD_ID AS codeboardId, c.USER_ID AS userId, c.ANALYSIS_ID AS analysisId, c.CODEBOARD_TITLE AS codeboardTitle, c.CODEBOARD_BLOCKS AS codeboardBlocks, c.CODEBOARD_DELETED_YN AS codeboardDeletedYn, cah.REPOSITORY_URL AS repositoryUrl, cah.FILE_PATH AS filePath, cah.ANALYSIS_TYPE AS analysisType, cah.TONE_LEVEL AS toneLevel, cah.CUSTOM_REQUIREMENTS AS customRequirements, cah.ANALYANALYSIS_RESULTSIS_RESULT AS analysisResults, cah.AI_SCORE AS aiScore FROM CODEBOARD c JOIN CODE_ANALYSIS_HISTORY cah ON cah.ANALYSIS_ID = c.ANALYSIS_ID WHERE c.CODEBOARD_ID = 1

SELECT f.FREEBOARD_ID AS freeboardId, f.USER_ID AS userId, u.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickName, f.FREEBOARD_TITLE AS freeboardTitle, f.FREEBOARD_CONTENT AS freeboardContent, f.FREEBOARD_DELETED_YN ASfreeBoardDeletedYn FROM FREEBOARD f JOIN USERS u ON u.USER_ID = f.USER_ID WHERE f.FREEBOARD_ID = #{boardId}
